title: Phosphorus often limiting factor due to solubility

content.question: Which of the following best helps to explain why phosphorus is often a limiting factor in many ecosystems?

choices.label: There is usually a gaseous phase in the phosphorus cycle.
Phosphorus cycles very quickly through environments.
Under many conditions, phosphorus forms stable insoluble compounds.
Phosphate is not readily taken up by plants.
There are no anthropogenic sources of phosphorus.

content.answer: Under many conditions, phosphorus forms stable insoluble compounds.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
